entities.name: house-elf liberation front
entities.description: The organization mentioned in the text, but no further details are provided.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is a member of the House-Elf Liberation Front and has been freed. He is mentioned as being happy to be free and wants to visit Harry sometimes.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is kind to Dobby and allows him to visit him.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is impressed by Fred and George's ability to get food from the kitchens.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who thinks that Dobby coming to work at Hogwarts will inspire other house-elves to want their freedom.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Ron's twin brother who is mentioned as being able to get food from the kitchens.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: Ron's twin brother who is mentioned as being able to get food from the kitchens.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: A house-elf who is mentioned in relation to Dobby and the other elves.

relationships.description: Harry is kind to Dobby and allows him to visit him.
Ron mentions his twin brother Fred.
Ron mentions his twin brother George.
Hermione thinks that Dobby coming to work at Hogwarts will inspire other house-elves to want their freedom.
Harry warns the others not to look too closely at Winky.
